title: Foam Finger of Destiny, Mission bugged?
body:
Hey guys, just wondering how we are supposed to unlock the Foam Finger of Destiny icon. 
My girlfriend and I have watched hours and hours of vods from watch.lolesports.com and still can't unlock it?

replies.body: Any updates as to whether the bug has been fixed?
Hey me too. I watched at least 15 games already but cannot get the icon mission. WHAT HAPPEN??
Download Lol Friends (Riot's LoL App), go to settings and enable ''Esports Watch Rewards''

> [{quoted}](name=DAMN,realm=EUW,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=aEuEYNI1,comment-id=000a,timestamp=2019-03-05T11:08:22.901+0000)
>
> Download Lol Friends (Riot's LoL App), go to settings and enable ''Esports Watch Rewards''

has anyone else tried that please?

OMG! Thank you so much! It works! 
{{sticker:katarina-love}}

You need to enable an option in the mobile app of League. Then you'll get the rewards. If you did it right you should see a message when you start watching the stream that you can earn rewards.{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
Same here. I also log in every time. It could be Bait ^_^ Not cool

> [{quoted}](name=Brutal Legend,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=aEuEYNI1,comment-id=,timestamp=2019-01-19T22:20:27.763+0000)
>
> Hey guys, just wondering how we are supposed to unlock the Foam Finger of Destiny icon. 
> My girlfriend and I have watched hours and hours of vods from watch.lolesports.com and still can't unlock it?

Same here, I am hoping for a fix soon

no idea but clearly multi server issue?
i been watching LPL mainly but also watched live OPL
